text: Whiffs is a 1975 American crime comedy movie directed by Ted Post and starring Elliott Gould, Eddie Albert, Harry Guardino, Godfrey Cambridge and Jennifer O'Neill. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1976. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 comedy movies Category:1975 crime movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Post Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American heist movies Category:American satirical movies Category:Movies about bank robbery
title: Whiffs
